testcase.name: theStepShouldExecuteSuccessfullyWithoutThrowingAnyErrors
testcase.system-out: the step should execute successfully without throwing any errors: SUCCESS

testcase.name: ThereShouldBeExactlyOneFileset
testcase.system-out: There should be exactly one fileset: SUCCESS

testcase.name: ThereShouldBe8XHTMLFilesInTheFileset
testcase.system-out: There should be 8 XHTML files in the fileset: SUCCESS

testcase.name: allFilesShouldHaveTheirAppropriateAttributesSet
testcase.system-out: all files should have their appropriate attributes set: SUCCESS

testcase.name: ThereShouldOnlyBeOneFileOnDisk
testcase.system-out: There should only be one file on disk: SUCCESS

testcase.name: TheOnlyFileOnDiskShouldBeValentinJpg
testcase.system-out: The only file on disk should be valentin.jpg: SUCCESS

testcase.name: ThereShouldBeExactly8InmemoryDocuments
testcase.system-out: There should be exactly 8 in-memory documents: SUCCESS

testcase.name: ThereShouldBeAInmemoryDocumentWithBaseSinglehtmlC000001coverXhtml
testcase.system-out: There should be a in-memory document with base single-html/C00000-1-cover.xhtml: SUCCESS

testcase.system-out: There should be a in-memory document with base single-html/C00000-2-frontmatter.xhtml: SUCCESS

testcase.system-out: There should be a in-memory document with base single-html/C00000-5-chapter.xhtml: SUCCESS

testcase.system-out: There should be a in-memory document with base single-html/C00000-6-chapter.xhtml: SUCCESS

testcase.name: ThereShouldBeAInmemoryDocumentWithBaseSinglehtmlC000007conclusionXhtml
